QuestData.Title: The Shifting Tides
QuestData.Description:
I'm no tidesage, but even I can tell that whatever you have there is probably not a good sign for the bastion.
There's one of those Tortollans, Rikal, who's been helping us figure out a solution to whatever the naga are planning in front of the levee. He'd probably like to see this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Rikal at Fort Daelin.
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm.... This is concerning. Very concerning.
